company.description: PW Skills is an Indian upskilling platform by PhysicsWallah that offers affordable, job-focused courses in Full Stack Development, Data Science, DSA, Cloud, Machine Learning, and more. It focuses on practical learning, projects, and placement assistance for students and working professionals.

faq.question: What does PW Skills do?
faq.answer: PW Skills provides affordable job-oriented courses in Full Stack Development, Data Science, DSA, Cloud, and Python, with projects and placement assistance.

faq.question: Are the courses beginner-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, most PW Skills courses start from scratch and are completely beginner-friendly.

faq.question: Do you offer placement assistance?
faq.answer: Yes, PW Skills provides placement and internship assistance for select courses.

faq.question: Are there live classes?
faq.answer: Courses offer a mix of live classes, recorded lessons, assignments, and projects.

faq.question: Do you provide certificates?
faq.answer: Yes, PW Skills provides industry-recognized certificates after course completion.

faq.question: Is there a free trial?
faq.answer: Some courses may offer demo videos, but full courses are paid.

faq.question: Who are these courses for?
faq.answer: Students, beginners, professionals switching careers, and freshers preparing for tech jobs.

faq.question: Refund policy?
faq.answer: Refunds vary by course and batch. Check the course page for exact terms.
